tag_list: gm, eim, sap, high-tech-sales, business-development, turn-around-specialist, new-business-models
overview:
He currently has a very entrepreneurial role at SAP: global responsibility for our information orchestration business, EIM. This is a ‘top 5 business’ at SAP and growing at many multiples of market.

Victor’s DNA is that of a high tech revenue executive that has always been above plan. Getting myself ready for larger roles, I have spent the last few years working on the other part of the equation: getting the right product to market.

degrees.subject: Business
degrees.institution: University of California Berkeley Haas School of Business
